name: Hidden Objects Autumn Harvest & Halloween Object
name_original: Hidden Objects Autumn Harvest & Halloween Object
description:
Hidden Objects – Autumn Harvest is a magnificently designed search and finder game with over 30 Fall levels.

Find festive Autumn themed objects like pumpkins, turkeys, acorns, yellow, green and orange fall leaves, candy corn, scarecrows, ghosts, Halloween decorations, Indian corn, gourds, hayrides, pumpkin patches and more!

Explore Autumn Harvest by seeing fall foliage covered forests, pumpkin patches, rustic barns, cornfields and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure through Autumn season is sure to entertain!

Hidden Objects – Autumn Harvest features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics reflecting Fall & Autumn themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Drag Scene to Search


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
